property.name: Text
property.value: [Stark] character only. Attached character gains stealth during [Military] challenges. If attached character is Jon Snow, he gets +2 STR and gains 'Response: discard an attachment on Jon Snow to save him from being killed.'

property.value: Discard Woods of the North from play if another player wins dominance. Marshalling: kneel to lower the cost of the next [Stark] character you play this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Stark only. Response: after you win dominance by 4 or more total STR, choose and kill a character with STR 2 or lower. Limit 1 per round.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Targaryen only. Marshalling: pay 2 gold to return any number of characters in play that you own to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon only. Response: after you win dominance, reveal the top 5 cards of an opponent's deck, discard one of the cards, and put the rest on the top of the deck in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: Draw: each player chooses up to 4 cards from his or her hand. Discard all other cards in hand from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Targaryen only. Response: after you have lost a [Military] and an [Intrigue] challenge this round, Daenerys Targaryen claims 2 power for each Dragon you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: pay 2 gold to choose and kneel a character. Then, attach this card to that character (counts as a Condition attachment) with the text 'Attached character gets -1 STR'.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Greyjoy only. After you win dominance by 4 or more total STR, kneel all opponents' locations. They do not stand during the standing phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: pay 1 gold to discard Maester's Conclave from your hand and draw a card. Marshalling: pay 2 gold to return each Maester character in play to its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after an opponent counts 0 total STR for dominance, attach this card to one of your [Greyjoy] characters (counts as a Condition attachment) with the text 'Attached character gets +2 STR and gains renown.'

property.name: Text
property.value: House Targaryen only. Response: after an opponent counts 0 total STR for dominance, attach this card to one of his or her characters (counts as a Condition attachment) with the text 'Attached character gets -3 STR.'

property.name: Text
property.value: House Stark only. Any phase: until the end of the phase, event cards cannot be cancelled.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you win dominance by 4 or more total STR, choose a [Baratheon] character to claim 1 power. Limit 1 per round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: pay 4 gold to search your deck for up to 5 characters, each with a different printed House affiliation. Reveal those characters to all players, and put them into your hand, then discard cards from your hand until you have 7 or fewer cards in your hand. Then shuffule your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon only. Marshalling: pay 1 gold to take an attachment from your discard pile and attach it to a character you control. If the attachment cannot be legally attached, it is discarded.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Claim 3 power for your House. Play only if you control at least one character of each of the following printed House affiliations: [Stark], [Lannister], [Baratheon], [Greyjoy] and [Targaryen]. Limit 1 per round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel X of your Clansman characters to choose and kneel X locations.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: each participating character with stealth gets -2 STR and loses stealth for the duration of the challenge.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing,-,-

property.name: Text
property.value: Each time a player with more than two cards in hand draws a card other than the standard two cards in the draw phase, that player must choose and discard a card from his or her hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only. Response: after you win dominance by 4 or more total STR, discard 2 cards at random from each opponent's hand. Limit 1 per round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you count income, add 2 gold to your income. Limit 1 per round. Play only if you control fewer characters than any opponent.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Greyjoy only. Marshalling: ignore all gold penalties for the next card you play this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel one of your [Greyjoy] characters with printed STR 3 or higher to choose and discard from play a location or attachment. Limit 1 per round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: choose and stand a Septon character. Then attach this card to that character (counts as a Condition attachment) with the text 'Attached character gains a [Power] icon.'

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Night's Watch characters do not kneel to attack or defend during [Military] challenges this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Stark only. Response: after an opponent counts 0 STR for dominance, choose and kill a non-unique character he or she controls. Limit 1 per round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after a character ability is triggered, cancel the effects of that ability.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after an opponent counts 0 total STR for dominance, put a [Baratheon] character from your hand into play. Limit 1 per round.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only. Response: after an opponent counts 0 STR for dominance, search your deck for an event card, reveal it to all players, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck. Limit 1 per round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: choose an attacking [Stark] character. For the duration of the challenge, that character gets -2 STR. Then, attach this card to that character(counts as a Condition attachment) with the text 'While defending, attached character gains renown and +2 STR.'

property.name: Text
property.value: House Targaryen only. Response: after you win dominance by 4 or more total STR, search your deck for an attachment card and attach it to a card in play. If attachment can not be legally attached it is discarded. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: X is equal to the number of different printed House affiliations on the standing characters you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the beginning of each phase other than the challenge phase, stand all characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Treat all characters in play as though their text boxes were blank (except for Traits). Limit one per plot deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Lower the gold cost for you to play event cards by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cannot be cancelled. When revealed during the plot phase, the player with the most cards in hand chooses and discards cards from his hand until he has 4 cards in hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, you may search your deck for an attachment and attach it to a character you control on which it can legally be attached. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Skip the dominance phase this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, each player chooses and kills a character he or she controls. The player who controls the most Night's Watch characters may ignore this effect.
